channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Git Parameter Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Git Parameter Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2238|2024-08-04T07:01:41.300Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20git%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Git Parameter Plugin 0.9.12 and earlier does not escape the repository field on the 'Build with Parameters' page, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Job/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2020-2112|2024-08-04T07:01:40.443Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20git%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Git Parameter Plugin 0.9.11 and earlier does not escape the parameter name shown on the UI, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability exploitable by users with Job/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2020-2113|2024-08-04T07:01:40.866Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20git%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Git Parameter Plugin 0.9.11 and earlier does not escape the default value shown on the UI, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability exploitable by users with Job/Configure permission.
